snippet: Mary Pride, a hero to conservative Christians, embraces technology and the Internet.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column profiles Mary Pride, a hero to evangelical Christians and a pioneer in home schooling, who embraces use of technology and the Internet in her teaching methods.
lead_paragraph: Mary Pride, a hero to conservative Christians, embraces technology and the Internet.
